column5: I'm booked, cottage 9 on the water. I have to start getting ready, it's only six months away! -Brian
Art,GCD and I are in.The southern contingency will be there.May even have one or two more.....tjsa are you listening? Joe
Good to see alot of the old regulars are heading back up again this year and great to see some new faces are gonna join us too
Ive got my cabin booked too, but I might not leave it cause it looks like such a sausage fest.   Anyone bringing a female companion?
Our truck is on auto-pilot for that weekend, so if we're not in it, it just goes there without us.  It's easier just to go with it  Cheers.  Joey

I know what I want for my b'day which is in last part of May....A getaway going fishing...the great outdoors....Yeah buddy! We are going to book a place soon for this summer, will be nice to getaway.....  Lorissa
None that we're gonna share with you budd !  Leah's coming with me, Ruth with Deg, Joey be there with Tybo etc etc. Enough to keep us all in check! LOL
And don't forget about Mo and Lady Walleye too
Now Wayne, shouldnt that be their decision?    LOL
Dan...did you want one of us to find you a date?
No thanks Wayne, I'm just goofing around with ya. I have someone in mind anyway, just didnt want her to be the only female there.
I'd like to eventually make it up to one if these G2G's.  It sounds like a great time is had by all.  I'll target June 2008 and hope to make it up.  fishinonthebrain

Well I got my cottage confirmed for Lakair! One of my goals for this year. Will be sharing the new boat with Baby Herc.  (Two birds with one stone - two of my other goals - fish with more OFNers and BPS Staffers  )   Can hardly wait. Who else is confirmed??

Getting close to talking the wife into letting me come up for a few days or so. Never been there to stay, but while we were on the French River last year, we made a run up around Lakair and had a look around.  Looks like a really nice place and the owners very friendly and helpful.   I'd be looking to share a place to sleep and a boat with some one.  Still working on it ... I'd love to met some of the OFC'rs.
I haven't confirmed my campsite yet Roger, but I'll definetly be there as always.
Long ...long time ago Roger! Cabin #7
I was going to book until I realized that it's the same weekend as my wife's b-day  I will have to miss another year, maybe the date could change next year? hehe  Tony

Hi all. For the benifit of some of us newbies here could someone give a few details on the Lakair trip. When is it? Is it a mini tourney amonst OFNr's? Is it open to all OFNr's? Its sounds like a fun weekend. It may be the excuse I need to finally drive my boat to the other end of the lake.

Guess we lost the pinned Lakair thread from the last Forum...maybe we should start another.  Nippissing...the "official" event is the weekend of June 23/24th. Many of us will be there for most of the week 18th to 25th and some after that as well.

Nipissing, This will be my first Lakair OFC get together.  There is a Pike tourney I think on the Saturday.  Others can correct me if I'm wrong. This has grown into a major event and the cast includes most of the BIG names from the board.  As Wayne says, many will be there early and all reports are that it is the "OFC EVENT OF THE YEAR" Hope to see you there.

Thanks for the info guys. At this point in time I can guarantee that I will be there for at least a day. Generally take some time off about then. Its a good hike to the other end of the lake from where my place is. Will have to dig out the gps---on second thought I will get myself a navigator. Always wanted to make the trip down there by boat.
Wayne can you bring the motorhome so I have some place to sleep?   I promise not to break anything  Whopper

Better bring a tent Budd! Our older daughters University Grad is June 7th in TO and we'll be up to the lake the next day if I have my way. Therefore we'll be coming down to Lakair this year, with truck and boat in tow....no motorhome.  Tourney has been 12 noon to 3pm on Saturday and some of those caught become the fillets for the fish fry, while the un-needed and strong fighters get released for another day.
Good luck with the date change Tony... I asked my wife to change her birthday from June 5 to the first Wednesday in June to free up some weekends in the future. She's so inflexible. -Brian

I was kidding Wayne, got a new tent for Christmas  . Just hope I can attend this year because this g2g is right on the heals of long anticipated trip to NWO Someone is going to have to keep Glen in check  Whopper
I will be there!!!! Hopefully 1 day earlier this year.. Trying to land Wenesday........ Hey Wanye feel free to bring a bunch of those University girls with you!!!!!!!! Robin
I gather your wife doesn't read the board eh Robin
I have yet to see something "official" for the Lakair G2G. Personally I'd prefer it in August, less bugs and more active muskies.
All the time you spend here Pete and you've never seen it mentioned!? lol  We even had a multi page thread going already on the old forum...  Booked my cottage back on October the 16th.
Nope Jim She is forbidin to visit this site....
Still rubing feet, hoping for the best

Hi Roger, We are like Irishfield, booked ages ago.  We have the same cabin as last year ... think it is #5.  Kevin, have you renumbered them? He does that every year in order to keep Roy guessing who he slept with. lol
It's a week I look forward to all winter and I'll be going at least twice again this year, June & September

Yeah,We're trying to decide what to do......We are shooting for the whole week up there,but now we need to decide if we bring the goose-neck home away from home....or the boat?Decisions.decisions........
....Oh I'm pretty sure I'll be there.
I think you guys should help me out  everyone send a PM to 'Mandy' telling her that she needs to go to Lakair for her Birthday.  This should be good...  Tony
